Light Crossbow 18m Two-Handed

Light Crossbow of Speed is one of the Light Crossbow Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Light Crossbow of Speed, this crossbow's design enables bolts to effortlessly slot in, ready to swiftly take flight from its stock.
